The Reflective Zone: Who is someone you look up to?
The Fun Zone: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: How do you think you are able to reach your maximum potential?

The Reflective Zone: How do you think your future self will remember your current self?
The Fun Zone: Tell me the 3 best things about you.
The Thought-Provoking Zone: What should be humanity’s goal?

The Reflective Zone: When did you screw everything up, but no one ever found out it was you?
The Fun Zone: On a scale of 1-10, how strict are/were your parents?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Should everyone on the planet be striving toward a common goal? If so, what would that be?

The Reflective Zone: What have you gotten away with? How sneaky were you when you were younger? Or was it something recent that you messed up and got away with?
The Fun Zone: Who was your worst teacher? Why?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Can you think of something that everyone could agree on, despite the chaotic world we live in?

The Reflective Zone: What would you name your boat if you had one?
The Fun Zone: Who was your favorite teacher? Why?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: How will humans become extinct?

The Reflective Zone: What will finally break the internet?
The Fun Zone: Which would you pick: being world-class attractive, a genius or famous for doing something great?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Will it be an environmental disaster? A rampant disease? Or maybe you think a meteor will hit the earth that is large enough to ruin the entire planet.

The Reflective Zone: What celebrity would you rate as a perfect 10?
The Fun Zone: Who are the 3 greatest living musicians?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Do you think humans will last another 1,000 years?

The Reflective Zone: Which fictional character would be the most boring to meet in real life?
The Fun Zone: If you could change one thing about yourself, what would it be?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: If you could teach the entire world just one concept, what would it be?

The Reflective Zone: What is the best and worst purchases you’ve ever made?
The Fun Zone: What was your favorite toy growing up?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: What concept do you think could have the most significant positive impact on humanity?

The Reflective Zone: If you had to change your name, what would your new name be, and why would you choose that name?
The Fun Zone: Name 3 celebrities you most admire.
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Is mankind going in the right or wrong direction?

The Reflective Zone: What are some things that sound like compliments but are actually insults?
The Fun Zone: Name a celebrity you think is lame.
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Have humans figured out how to keep progressing towards something better?

The Reflective Zone: What’s a body part that you wouldn’t mind losing?
The Fun Zone: What accomplishment are you most proud of?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Or are we moving backward and should revert back to the values and lifestyles of those who lived before us?

The Reflective Zone: What’s your biggest screw up in the kitchen?
The Fun Zone: Which of your friends are you proudest of? Why?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Is it better for someone to have a wide range of superficial knowledge or deep knowledge about a few things?

The Reflective Zone: What’s the worst commercial you’ve recently seen? Why is it so bad?
The Fun Zone: What’s the most beautiful place you’ve ever been?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: What if there were no professionals in any given subject, but everyone knew a little bit about everything?

The Reflective Zone: What’s the closest thing to real magic?
The Fun Zone: What are your 3 favorite movies?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: How can we judge ourselves by our intentions yet judge others by their actions?

The Reflective Zone: What is the craziest thing one of your teachers has done?
The Fun Zone: How would you describe me to your friends?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Can we ever believe someone when they say their intentions are different from their actions? What if someone’s intentions were truly transparent?

The Reflective Zone: Who is the messiest person you know?
The Fun Zone: Which historical figure would you like to be?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: What is the biggest waste of human potential?

The Reflective Zone: What problem or situation did TV/movies make you think would be common, but when you grew up you found out it wasn’t?
The Fun Zone: What’s the right age to get married?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: There are so many possible answers to this question, but which do you believe is the truest?

The Reflective Zone: What quote or saying do people spout but are complete BS?
The Fun Zone: Tell me 3 things you remember about kindergarten.
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Is it not sharing your wisdom with other people? Not spreading knowledge? Is it engaging in traditional schooling where children are confined to desks for most of the day?

The Reflective Zone: What’s something your brain tries to make you do and you have to will yourself not to do it?
The Fun Zone: What paper that you’ve written are you most proud of?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Why are people resistant to doing things that we know are healthy but crave things that are detrimental to our health?

The Reflective Zone: What is the dumbest way you’ve been injured?
The Fun Zone: What would you do if you were invisible for a day?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: What if one of your long-held memories isn’t actually completely true? Does it matter?

The Reflective Zone: If you could know the absolute and total truth to one question, what question would you ask?
The Fun Zone: Who would you like to live like for a day?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Can you think of times where you have felt completely sure of something but someone tells you otherwise?

The Reflective Zone: What’s the most interesting thing you’ve read or seen this week?
The Fun Zone: If you could time travel, where would you go?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: What harsh truths do you prefer to ignore?

The Reflective Zone: What ridiculous thing has someone tricked you into doing or believing?
The Fun Zone: If you could live in any TV home, what would it be?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Is free will real or just an illusion?

The Reflective Zone: If you were given a one-minute ad slot during the Super Bowl that you couldn’t sell, what would you fill it with?
The Fun Zone: What’s your favorite ice cream flavor?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Is there a meaning to life? If so, what is it?

The Reflective Zone: What’s the most useless talent you have?
The Fun Zone: Would you rather live for a week in the past or the future?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Is the meaning of life the same for animals and humans?

The Reflective Zone: What would be on the gag reel of your life?
The Fun Zone: What’s your most embarrassing childhood memory?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Where is the line between art and not art?

The Reflective Zone: Where is the worst smelling place you’ve been?
The Fun Zone: What’s your best childhood memory?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: If someone you loved was killed in front of you, but someone created a copy of them that was perfect right down to the atomic level, would they be the same person and would you love them just as much?

The Fun Zone: What’s your favorite holiday?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Does fate exist? If so, do we have free will?

The Fun Zone: If you could eat only 3 foods for the rest of your life, what would they be?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: What does it mean to live a good life?

The Fun Zone: If you could be a cartoon character for a week, who would you be?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Why do we dream?

The Fun Zone: If you could have dinner with anyone from history, who would it be?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Is it possible to live a normal life and not ever tell a lie?

The Fun Zone: What’s one choice you really regret?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Does a person’s name influence the person they become?

The Fun Zone: What’s your favorite childhood book?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: What should be the goal of humanity?

The Fun Zone: What’s a great book you’ve read recently?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: If you could become immortal on the condition you would NEVER be able to die or kill yourself, would you choose immortality?

The Fun Zone: Do you feel like a leader or a follower?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: How will humans as a species go extinct?

The Fun Zone: If you could ask your pet 3 questions, what would they be?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: What actions in your life will have the longest reaching consequences? How long will those effects be felt?

The Fun Zone: What’s the most courageous thing you’ve ever done?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: How long will you be remembered after you die?

The Fun Zone: Who would play you in a movie of your life?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: If a child somehow survived and grew up in the wilderness without any human contact, how “human” would they be without the influence of society and culture?

The Fun Zone: If you could be an Olympic athlete, in what sport would you compete?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: Where does your self-worth come from?

The Fun Zone: If you had to live in a different state, what would it be?
The Thought-Provoking Zone: How would humanity change if all humans’ life expectancy was significantly increased (let’s say to around 500 years)?
Where do you find meaning in your life?
What do you think would be humanity’s reaction to the discovery of extraterrestrial life?
Will religion ever become obsolete?
If you could teach everyone in the world one concept, what concept would have the biggest positive impact on humanity?
Is suffering a necessary part of the human condition? What would people who never suffered be like?
Does hardship make a person stronger? If so, under what conditions and at what point is it too much hardship? If not, what makes a person stronger?
Would things get better or worse if humans focused on what was going well rather than what’s going wrong?
What benefits does art provide society? Does art hurt society in any way?
